DOC.brief_summary: Lung cancer may cause central airway obstruction several different mechanism ( invasion primary tumor , invasion metastatic lymph node , airway metastasis ) . The aim present study determine prevalence time diagnosis , incidence 1 year diagnosis , predictor central airway obstruction associate advanced lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Incidence Central Airway Obstruction Advanced Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Advanced lung cancer indication chemotherapy chemotherapy + radiation therapy Age < 18 year Pregnancy Refusal sign inform consent
